title: Software & Computer Vision Engineer (ECE)
tagline: C++ | DSA | Python | OpenCV | Frontend Development
about: I am an undergraduate student pursuing a B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering at IIITDM Jabalpur, with a strong focus on computer science and software development. I actively practice Data Structures and Algorithms in C++ through competitive programming, which has strengthened my problem-solving skills and analytical thinking. Alongside this, I work as a frontend developer using HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, and I am currently learning backend development to build full-stack applications. I also have a keen interest in AI and Machine Learning, with hands-on experience in basic ML concepts and libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and OpenCV. My background in ECE allows me to approach problems with a blend of hardware understanding and software engineering principles, and I am driven by continuous learning and building efficient, real-world solutions.

projects.title: My Portfolio Webpage
projects.description: Built a responsive and dynamic portfolio website with modular architecture, enabling easy content updates and showcasing projects, skills, and achievements using modern frontend technologies.

projects.title: AI Posture Guide
projects.description: AI Posture Guide is a real-time computer vision system that detects and analyzes human posture using a camera feed. It identifies incorrect postures such as slouching and neck bending and provides instant feedback to help users maintain proper posture.

projects.title: Quick Teams Webapp
projects.description: Quick Teams is a web application designed to help hackathon participants quickly find and form ideal teams using skill-based matching. It enables users to create profiles, manage availability, send connection requests, and automatically form team groups, providing a smooth and clutter-free collaboration experience for events and hackathons.
